about.title: We Care About Your Pets And Their Well-Being
about.desc: Happy Paw is an online store that offers goods for your pets: cats and dogs, fish, rabbits, birds, and many other animals.
about.selling: We sell pet food, supplies, clothes, and different products by the best American and European manufacturers. We are pet lovers, just like you, and pick only the best and high-quality goods:

support.title: Online Support
support.content: We are always here to help.
